#include<iostream>
//#include<conio.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{   long long int a[100000],i,n,m=0,e,s,av,t,j,v=0,x,r,y,k=0;
	//long double 
	//float k=0;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{ s=0,av=0,r=0,v=0,x=0,k=0,y=0;
		cin>>n;
		y=n;
		
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
		  cin>>a[i];
		  	av=av+a[i];
		}if(n==1)
		{
			cout<<"0"<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		e=av;
		//cout<<"av="<<av<<endl;
		if(e%n!=0)
		{
			cout<<"No Treat"<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		av=av/n;
	  	//cout<<"av=="<<av<<endl;
	    
		sort(a,a+n);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{   if(a[i]>av)
		     {
			   v=i;
		      break;
		      }
		      else if(a[i]==av)
		      {
		      	
		      	continue;
		      }
			x=av-a[i];
			s=s+x;
		}
	   	cout<<s<<endl;
	
		  
	}
	
	//getch();
	return 0;
}
